tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Respected (1)
comments: your average teacher. lectures and gives 3 midterms based on books/lectures. mandatory 8 hours of community service. his class is really laid back but its hard to get an A because the only thing that makes up your grade is the midterms and final. miderms are kind of in depth...but its a cool class if you\'re okay with not getting an A.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Good professor who has interesting things to say in his lectures. Takes sociological approach to teaching history. 2 midterms & final are all written examinations. Seems to grade them fairly easily. 8 hours of mandatory community service, which is easy b/c he always announces community service opportunities so you don\'t have to go find it yourself.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Mr. Salinas is a cool dude and a top-notch instructor. He has a passion for Mexican-American History and does an excellent job of "tying-in" the history to what is going on today. I am glad I took this class, as I learned so much about the relationships between Spain, Mexico (Latin America) and the USA; and learned a little bit more about myself.
